Text: Sergei is an excellent developer. I worked with him for about six months, and this was enough to know how skilled he is, and how passionate is about the work he does. He is also a great team player, always willing to share his knowledge and to help others to complete their tasks. I'm sure he will add great value on any project he works on.

Sergei es uno de los mejores Front End Developers con los que he colaborado, es una persona con iniciativa, creativa y meticulosa que propone soluciones y se mantiene actualizado con el día a día en tecnología y desarrollo.

Espero volver a trabajar con el.

Sergei is a developer who has strong skills on different technologies and is focused to improve constantly, reading about best practices and performance, keeping track the latest technologies, working side by side with his team mates to share his knowledge, asking constantly for feedback.

I highly recommend Sergei for any kind of web development, he is an excellent developer and teammate.
